data.name: Labyrinth
data.detailed_description:
Labyrinth is a single player action rpg that takes place in a world, abandoned by its god during an apocalyptic event, forcing survivors to sail to the last piece of land, a mysterious island, where a Labyrinth exists, leading a sole survivor to a new world called Paradise. Explore the island, outside and within the dungeon for valuable loot, mighty weapons and armors. Face demons and fight warriors in battles that all feel like boss battles. Every battle matters. Every attack matters. Navigating through the Labyrinth will involve some metroidvanian exploration aspects.


Yes, this page is up a bit early. But wanted to welcome everyone anyways to see support grow for this title. Now in development.



The intense gameplay focuses on weapon based combat using classic elements like swords and shields but with a heavy emphasis on weapon colliding, armor breaking, and cutting of flesh. Weapons have weight and with this consideration, when you swing, matters.



Directional attacks allow you to specifically target where to attack. Exposing weak points to make kills easier. Or swing against an attack to parry and defend.

data.short_description: Labyrinth is an intense close ranged hack n slash focused on steel vs steel action in deep and deadly battles against nightmarish demons within a mysterious labyrinth that promises to lead triumphant warriors off their dying world.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz/ AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940

content_descriptors.notes: The game's mechanics involve impale and cutting of flesh of humans and creatures. Blood is used frequently. No extreme guts and gore, although cutting of body parts does happen.
